ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Key falls forward when Shuko s shots hit her and yells a bit in pain. She turns around and is about to fire back when she goes unconscious from her wounds.

Received: (qmail 68409 invoked by uid 0); 17 Jun 2000 20:34:31 -0000
Message-ID: <20000617203431.68408.qmail@...>
Received: from 172.148.221.52 by www.hotmail.com with HTTP; Sat, 17 Jun 2000 13:34:31 PDT
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
Date: Sat, 17 Jun 2000 16:34:31 EDT
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed
From: "Blue Stinger / Key \(Jen D.\)" <jeniff69@...>

Key falls forward when Shuko's shots hit her and yells a bit in pain. She 
turns around and is about to fire back when she goes unconscious from her 
wounds.

Blue Stinger is thrown forwards when the rockets from Zeus hit her and 
crashes through a tree. She lands with a wing broken and faints from the 
impact.

Antagony flies into a boulder as Annihilator's shots his her in the back. 
She turns around and shots at him.

Sona yells in pain when the rocket expodes behind her, sending her into a 
bouder. The hole in her torso quickly puts her into stasis lock.

>From: KSLawdogg@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Sat, 17 Jun 2000 16:03:05 EDT
>
>The Oblitercons/Koga Shuko/Nemesis
>Enforcer/Serpentor/Unitron/Anubis/Hades/Sixshot:
>
>
>
>Koga Shuko chuckled.  "You act like an infant." he laughed, transforming to
>his jet fighter mode, launching into the air at mach 3, the flames of all 
>the
>explosions and attacks englufing the trees, and lightly scratching his
>"paint" job.  <Retreat, I repeat, retreat!> he ordered, heading for his 
>base
>after firing twenty rapid laser blasts at Key's back.
>
>---
>
>"Liono Prime....hmmm...the negotiations ended last time I checked.  FAIR
>GAME!" Dark One bellowed aloud, bringing up his targeting computer, firing
>four seeking missiles at Liono.
>
>---
>
>Breakdown activated his internal computer, getting a fixed, he launched a
>powerful rocket into the sky, descending rapidly down towards Liono.
>
>---
>
>Hiss fired four fusion blasts from his cannon, waiting to see the carnage.
>
>---
>
>Scavenger swerved in his HUMVEE mode, firing thirty shells at Liono.
>
>---
>
>Pyro swerved his cannon, firing an arc of flames at Liono, Dark One flying
>away, followed by all the Oblitercons on the ground, Pyro's cannon aiming
>backwards in case.
>
>---
>
>Serpentor fell to his back from Zergling's shots, firing an optic blast in 
>an
>arc at Zergling and Nemesis Enforcer, Nemesis slamming to the ground.
>Serpentor leapt into the air, running off for the Newcomer's base.
>
>---
>
>Unitron chuckled.  Seeking missiles, easy to dodge, if you had the 
>expertise.
>  Activating flares, four ejected at the missiles (don't mean to post 
>damage),
>the missiles blowing up on impact, the force sending Unitron spinning.
>Transforming to robot mode, he slammed to the ground on his side.  Hearing
>Shuko's orders, he took out his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at
>Liono as he ran.
>
>---
>
>Anubis sidesteps, letting the blast scrape his arm.  Yelling in pain, he
>fired a rocket and two optic blasts off at Tigerhawk, falling back as 
>ordered.
>
>---
>
>Hades rolled to the left, the missiles going by, but laser beams twirling 
>him
>as they hit his side.  Falling to one knee, he jumped up to his feet, as he
>ran for the Newcomer's base, he pointed his laser rifle backwards, firing
>several rapid bolts at Tigerhawk.
>
>---
>
>Sixshot looked around.  "I can't believe we're losing to these pathetic
>Maximals." firing a rocket off from his missile launcher at the Ark, he
>transformed to his tank mode, firing a blast from the top cannon, and two
>missiles from embedded missile launchers off at Liono, transforming to 
>space
>fighter mode and launching off into the air.
